name: Froggo Hop
description:
Lore

Your swamp has been corrupted by the pollution and now you have to scape, Froggy  is in danger and has to run for his life, It will have to face obstacles and enemies to find the way to his new home

Wil Froggy survive?

Enemies

  

 Setup Instructions Amstrad CPC:
  • Insert the Cassete on your Amstrad CPC 464
  • Type “RUN” and press Enter
  • Press Play on your Amstrad CPC 464
  • Press any key
  • Enjoy Froggo Hop
 Using an emulator

You can play the game using any AmstradCPC emulator we recommend you Retro Virtual Machine. 

  • Download Froggo Hop from our itch.io page
  • Load de CDT file.
  • Then type RUN" and press enter
  • Start Playing.
 Controls

Froggo Hop Controls are:

O - Move to the Left   

P - Move to the Right   

Q - press to JUMP

Other controls:

Space - This key is used in some occasions like start game

Esc - This key is used in some occasions like left the game

 Game Objective

The main goal in froggo Hop is reach the signal on every stage for get to the next level avoiding all the obstacles and enemies that can kill you.

You have 3 lives.

 Licenses

CPCTelera - Game Development framework for Amstrad CPC

Visual Studio Code- Code Editor use in our game.

Arkos Tracker - Music Tool Environment

Aseprite - Sprite Creator Tool

 Gesture

Our gesture of "Rainbow Islands" is implemented at the final stage, once you pass Froggo Hop first world "The swamp"
